name: Frog Hop, A Frogger Remake De-make!
name_original: Frog Hop, A Frogger Remake De-make!
description: BittyBigStudio is solo operated game development studio by independent game developer, Brandon Leon Channel. Frogger: He's Back is his favorite video game from the original Sony Playstation era. Brandon's strengths in development lie in music composition and storytelling. You can view other projects here: Brandon Leon Channel - itch.io
